price: Watajuulikana wakosefu kwa alama zao, basi watashikwa kwa nywele zao za utosini na kwa miguu.
arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yuʿ'rafu al-muj'rimūna bisīmāhum fayu'khadhu bil-nawāṣī wal-aqdāmi
